text: Random Album Title is the first studio album by Canadian electronica producer, deadmau5. Random Album Title was released on November 6, 2006. The album featured the hit singles "Faxing Berlin" and "I Remember" featuring Kaskade. The song "Arguru" was written in memory of Juan Antonio Arguelles Rius, an audio-software developer and musician that died in a car accident. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2008 albums Category:Deadmau5 albums
title: Random Album Title
